Title: Viessmann Vitoden 050 BOKA combi boiler 30kW White
Description: Offering ease of installation, the low height Viessmann Vitodens 050 BOKA 30kW gas condensing combi boiler fits well into any home, whether a new build or refurb. It is supplied with a mounting bracket, connection set and mounting template and is both simple to use and efficient to run, with a high quality MatriX burner contributing to its cost-saving ErP A rating.

Title: Viessmann Vitodens 100-W 35 boiler and horizontal flue 100-W 35kW
Description: Quiet and compact, the clever Viessmann Vitodens 100-W 35kW combi boiler is an ideal choice for small, well-insulated homes. Supplied with a horizontal flue for ease of fitting, this wall-mounted combi boiler has an innovative design, employing an Inox-Radial heat exchanger for high levels of efficiency, earning it an ErP A rating. Highly economical, the Vitodens is ready to incorporate smart control technology for even better economy and eco-friendly comfort.

Title: Viessmann Vitodens 100-W B1GA-25 heat only NG/LPG boiler pack 25kW
Description: Hydrogen-ready (H2, 20% blend), the Viessmann Vitodens 100-W heat only natural gas condensing boiler is suitable for installation on existing open vented or sealed systems. Reliable and high performing, this ErP A-rated heat only boiler is fitted with the patented Viessmann Matrix Plus Burner and a stainless steel Inox-Radial heat exchanger. Lightweight and compact, the Vitodens 100-W is easy to install in almost any location.
